Description:
This is the MCP news that actually matters. Anthropic, OpenAI, and the community have proposed the MCP Apps extension, which allows servers to deliver actual interactive UIs, not just text and data. Learn how this standardizes interfaces using secure, sandboxed iframes.

#MCP #Anthropic #OpenAI

Author: GitHub
Title: Anthropic and OpenAI propose standard UIs for MCP
